title: wordMultiple
prompt: Given an array of strings, return a Map<String, Boolean> where each different string is a key and its value is true if that string appears 2 or more times in the array.
testcases_extended: wordMultiple(["d", "a", "e", "d", "a", "d", "b", "b", "z", "a", "a", "b", "z", "x"]) → {"a": true, "b": true, "d": true, "e": false, "x": false, "z": true}
